title: Made a Mo'orea LTER app with Shiny
description: I worked on creating an interactive graphing app to visualize long-term data from Mo'orea.
contents: I’ve spent the past couple of months exploring the Mo’orea Coral Reef LTER data (read more here: http://mcr.lternet.edu/) and created an interactive shiny app to visualize a couple of the core time series. The website is live here and the code I wrote to make the app can be found here. I’m hoping that the app will be a useful tool in showing the importance of long term research and could potentially be used in interactive outreach activities that show how long-term data can be used to spot trends over time and potential relationships between variables.

title: Set up my electronic lab notebook
description: Began setting up my electronic lab notebook and created my first post.
contents:
To make future posts:
Type require(distill) into the console
Use create_post(title = "Post name here", collection = "notebook") to specify a new lab notebook post
Or use create_post(title = "Post name here", collection = "posts") to specify a new code example post
Be sure to knit and push to Git after every new post
